XXbsa069_u:5: yadi [bhavatocyate] bhavadvacanaṃ nyāyyaṃ, paramasmadvacanamanyāyyaṃ tanna yuktam /
XXbsa069_u:6: kiñca yadanyāyyaṃ tadetatsvato nyāyyaṃ, tasmād yadanyāyyaṃ tannāsti /
XXbsa069_u:10: mama vacanamanyāyyamiti cedbhavatocyate, tato bhavānajña iti
XXbsa069_u:15: abhinnaṃ cedvacanamapi nāstīti mama vacanamanyāyyamiti bhavatā kathamucyate /
XXbsa069_u:16: atha bhinnaṃ, tato vacanaṃ nyāyyamiti mama vacanamanyāyyamiti kathaṃ bhavatocyate /
XXbsa069_u:19: yathā gośṛṅge 'śvakarṇau vā parasparaṃ khaṇḍayituṃ na śaknuvataḥ /
XXbsa069_u:26: paścād, evaṃ tarhyasmadvacanasidvatvāt kasya khaṇḍanaṃ bhaviṣyati? /
XXbsa069_u:27: samakālīnañcet, tato 'smadvacanaṃ bhavataśca khaṇḍanamityetayoretat khaṇḍanametacca khaṇḍanīyamiti viśeṣo na syāt /
XXbsa069_u:31: svakhaṇḍanārthañcet, tataḥ svataḥ svārthahīnaṃ bhavedasmadvacananu siddham /
XXbsa069_u:39: yato yadi kumārī putravatīti na sampadyate /
XXbsa069_u:48: yathā kaścinmanyeta śrotravijñānataḥ śabdasyānupalabdhiratha śrotravijñānataḥ śabdasyopalabdhiḥ
XXbsa069_u:57: yadi hetumāṃstadānityaḥ śabdo, yadi nityo naiva hetumān /
XXbsa069_u:77: iha loke yadā phalaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tadā sahetukaṃ jñātam /
XXbsa069_u:81: yad bhavatoktaṃ mama vacanamanyahisaṃvāditvāditi tadidamidānīṃ bhavatā sārdhaṃ vicārya nirdhāryate
XXbsa069_u:87: yadi bhavadartho 'smaduktādanyastadānyatvadoṣo bhavata eva na tu mama /
XXbsa069_u:101: yadyāvayorbheda eva na syānna tadā bhavatā vivādo 'haṃ tu bhavadarthameva vadāmi /
XXbsa069_u:104: yadi bhavato vākyaṃ nānyat, tarhi mamāpi vacanaṃ
XXbsa069_u:108: yad (bhavato)ktaṃ mama vacanamasiddhamiti tadidānīṃ (bhavatā sārdhaṃ) vicārya nirdhāryate
XXbsa069_u:113: atha vacanaṃ na prāptaṃ, kathaṃ bhavatocyate mayā yaduktaṃ tadasiddhamiti /
XXbsa069_u:118: yadi bhavaduktaṃ khaṇḍanamasiddhaṃ na syāt, tarhi mama vacanamapi naivāsiddham /
XXbsa069_u:123: yadyasiddha na svataḥ siddhaṃ, tadāsiddhaṃ na syāt /
XXbsa069_u:126: yadi bhavatocyate mama khaṇḍanamananubhāṣaṇameva tadā na mama matasyopalabdhi /
XXbsa069_u:127: (Tś 7) atha nopalabhyate mama mataṃ, tato mama khaṇḍanaṃ kartuṃ na śakyate /
XXbsa069_u:131: nānubhāṣate, tadā bhavān khaṇḍanaṃ vaktuṃ na śaknoti /
XXbsa069_u:132: kiṃ punarmanyate bhavān khaṇḍanamananubhāṣya khaṇḍanaṃ śakyaṃ, athavā khaṇḍanamanubhāṣya khaṇḍanaṃ śakyam /
XXbsa069_u:135: athavā khaṇḍanamanubhāṣya khaṇḍanaṃ vaktuṃ śakyaṃ, tadā sadaiva khaṇḍanānubhāṣaṇam syāt
XXbsa069_u:138: na ca sa kālo vidyate yatra na khaṇḍanānubhāṣaṇam /
XXbsa069_u:139: [ataḥ] yatra khaṇḍanaṃ vaktuṃ śakyate sa kālo nāsti /
XXbsa069_u:141: yadi tatkhaṇḍanānubhāṣaṇānnāma khaṇḍanamiti vaktuṃ śakyate, ananubhāṣya tu khaṇḍanamiti vaktuṃ ja śakyate
XXbsa069_u:147: ananubhāṣya khaṇḍanaṃ nāma vaktuṃ śakyamiti ced, ananubhāṣyāpi tataḥ prathamaṃ khaṇḍanaṃ nāma vaktuṃ śakyam /
XXbsa069_u:148: prathamaṃ khaṇḍanam nāmānanubhāṣya khaṇḍanaṃ nāma vaktuṃ śakyamiti cet, dvitīyamapi khaṇḍanaṃ nāmānanubhāṣya khaṇḍanaṃ nāma vaktuṃ śakyate /
XXbsa069_u:149: dvitīyaṃ khaṇḍanaṃ nāmānanubhāṣya khaṇḍanamiti vaktuṃ śakyata iti cet, prathamaṃ khaṇḍanaṃ (Tś 8) nāmāpyananubhāṣya khaṇḍanaṃ nāma vaktuṃ śakyeta /
XXbsa069_u:152: atha dvitīyaṃ khaṇḍanaṃ nāmāpyavaśyamanubhāṣyaṃ, tadā khaṇḍanaṃ nāma
XXbsa069_u:154: yadi punaḥ khaṇḍanamananubhāṣya vadet, khaṇḍanasya nigrahasthānāpattiḥ /
XXbsa069_u:155: yadi bhavān svakhaṇḍanaṃ nānubhāṣate, tato bhavaduktakhaṇḍanasya nigrahasthānāpattiḥ /
XXbsa069_u:156: yadi bhavān khaṇḍanamananubhāṣya khaṇḍanaṃ vadet, khaṇḍanaṃ vadaṃśca nigrahasthāne na patet, tadāhamapi khaṇḍanamananubhāṣya khaṇḍanaṃ vadanna nigrāhyaḥ /
XXbsa069_u:159: yadā tvahaṃ bhavanmataṃ khaṇḍayāmi tadā bhavānapyanubhāṣate /
XXbsa069_u:164: sarve śabdā yadā mukhānnirgatāstadā naṣṭā eveti kathaṃ
XXbsa069_u:169: naṣṭa iti cen, na kiñcidanubhāṣitavyaṃ tadabhāvāt /
XXbsa069_u:171: tvadanubhāṣaṇāyaitanme vacanamiti yadbhavān bravīti sa kutarka eva /
XXbsa069_u:172: yad (bhavato)ktaṃ madvacanaṃ pūrva, [bhavata] khaṇḍanaṃ tu paścāditi
XXbsa069_u:176: kuta iti (Tś 9) cen, madvacanaṃ pūrvaṃ bhavadvacanaṃ tu paścāditi /
XXbsa069_u:179: kiñca yadyucyate bhavatā sarvāṇi vacanāni pūrvavartīni khaṇḍanantu paravartīti, tadā bhavānapi pūrvameva vacanaṃ vadatīti paścātkhaṇḍanaṃ bhavet /
XXbsa069_u:180: yadi bhavadvacanasya pūrvavartitve 'pi paścātkhaṇḍanaṃ nāsti, tarhi madvacanasya pūrvavartitve 'pi, paścātkhaṇḍanaṃ na syāt /
XXbsa069_u:181: yacca khaṇḍanaṃ pūrvasya paravartīti svabhāvataḥ pūrvasya khaṇḍanaṃ na paścādasti /
XXbsa069_u:182: yadi svabhāvata eva pūrvasya khaṇḍanaṃ paścāt syāt, tadā pūrvaṃ paścādityubhe
XXbsa069_u:185: yadi svabhāvataḥ pūrvasya khaṇḍanaṃ na paścāt /
XXbsa069_u:187: tadā pūrvasyāpi khaṇḍanaṃ parabhāvi na bhavet /
XXbsa069_u:188: yadbhavatoktaṃ madvacanaṃ pūrvaṃ, khaṇḍanaṃ tu parabhāvi tanmithyā /
XXbsa069_u:189: yadabhihitaṃ bhavatā, mayā hetvantaramuktamiti tadidānīṃ (bhavatā sārdhaṃ)
XXbsa069_u:195: yadi hetvantarapratiṣṭhāpanādbhavato na nigrahasthānatvāpattistadā mamāpi tathā /
XXbsa069_u:198: yadyanyaṃ hetuṃ na vadeyaṃ, tato bhavaddhetuṃ vadeyam /
XXbsa069_u:201: pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ, tadā bhavānasmaddhetuṃ khaṇḍayatīti svahetumeva khaṇḍayati /
XXbsa069_u:202: api ca yadi sarvāṇi vacanāni hetvantarāṇi syustadābhavaduktāni vacanānyapi hetvantarāṇi bhaveyuḥ
XXbsa069_u:204: atha vacanānyuccārayannapi na bhavān nigrāhyastarhi yadbhavatoktaṃ hetuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayannahaṃ nigrāhya iti tadayuktam /
XXbsa069_u:205: yadbhavatoktamarthāntaraṃ vadāmīti tadidānīṃ (bhavatā sārdhaṃ) vicāryaṃ nirdhāryate /
XXbsa069_u:206: anyā me pratijñā, anyā ca bhavata iti yattannyāyyameva /
XXbsa069_u:208: yadi matamasmadartho bhavadarthādananyastadāsmadartho bhavadarthapratipakṣatayā na virudvo
XXbsa069_u:209: yadi bhavānasmadarthaṃ khaṇḍayati, tarhi bhavataḥ svārthasyaiva khaṇḍanaṃ bhavet /
XXbsa069_u:214: aparañca yaduktaṃ sarvaṃ tadarthāntarañcettadā bhavaduktamapyarthāntaraṃ bhavet /
XXbsa069_u:215: yadi bhavaduktamarthāntaraṃ na bhavettadā yadbhavatā pratijñātaṃ sarvamarthāntaramiti tadayuktam
XXbsa069_u:226: tataśca yadi bhavān māṃ khaṇḍayati, tarhi svārthasyaiva khaṇḍanam /
XXbsa069_u:231: tataśca yadbhavatoktaṃ bhavān pūrvavacanaṃ vadatīti tanmithyā /
XXbsa069_u:236: yadyahaṃ tadvadaṃstanna sādhayituṃ śaknomi, tadā yadbhavatoktamananyaditi tadyuktam
XXbsa069_u:237: / yacca (bhavato)ktaṃ mayā sarvamuktaṃ nānujñāyata iti tadidānīṃ (bhavatā
XXbsa069_u:239: sarvaṃ nānujñāyata iti yaduktaṃ bhavatā etadvacanaṃ sarvasminnantarbhavati na vā? /
XXbsa069_u:240: yadi tāvatsarvasminnantarbhavati tadā bhavān svayaṃ svoktaṃ nānujānāti /
XXbsa069_u:241: yadi svayaṃ nānujānātyasmadarthaḥ svata eva siddho bhavedbhavavacanasya tu hāniḥ syāt /
XXbsa069_u:242: atha sarvasminnāntarbhavati tadā tasya sarvatvameva na syāt /
XXbsa069_u:243: yadi sarvatvameva na bhavet, tadā bhavatā yadananujñātaṃ tatsarvam /
XXbsa069_u:252: yadi pratiṣṭhāpitaṃ khaṇḍanaṃ samyagarthena na saṃyuktaṃ syāttadā tadviparītakhaṇḍanamityucyate
XXbsa069_u:262: śabdo 'pi tatheti śabdo 'nitya iti sthāpite prativādī prāha /
XXbsa069_u:267: yannityaṃ na tatprayatnenotpannaṃ yathākāśaṃ nityaṃ na prayatnenotpannam /
XXbsa069_u:272: yadyākāśasādharmyaṃ (Tś 13) tato nitya eva śabda iti /
XXbsa069_u:281: prativādī tvanaikāntikaikarasārthapratyavasthānena khaṇḍanaṃ bhāṣate yathā yadi bhavān sādharmyeṇa śabdasyānityatāṃ sthāpayati tadāhamapi vaidharmyeṇa śabdasya nityatāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi /
XXbsa069_u:282: yadi ca bhavadarthaḥ siddho mamāpyarthaḥ siddho bhavediti /
XXbsa069_u:290: yadi bhavatā pratiṣṭhāpito heturasmaddhetutulyobhavettadā samyakkhaṇḍanaṃ sidhyeta /
XXbsa069_u:294: tadānityatāviparyāsadoṣo vyaktīkartuṃ na śakyata iti prasiddham /
XXbsa069_u:304: yadi śabdo nityākāśavidharmyādanitya iti, tadā kiṃ prāptam /
XXbsa069_u:305: yadi ghaṭavaidharmyaṃ śabdasya, tadā sa nitya iti /
XXbsa069_u:322: sthāpito hetuḥ kṛtakatvācchabdo 'nitya iti tasya (hetoḥ) pakṣadharmmaḥ sapakṣasattvaṃ vipakṣavyāvṛttiśca
XXbsa069_u:324: yaḥ punarbhavatpratiṣṭhāpito hetuḥ śabdo nityo 'mūrtatvāditi tasya pakṣadharmaḥ sapakṣe vipakṣe ca vartata ityasiddho hetuḥ /
XXbsa069_u:349: bhavaddhetuḥ sapakṣe vipakṣe ca vartate tasmādasādhakaḥ /
XXbsa069_u:353: yadatulyaṃ tulyamiti bhavatoktaṃ tasmādbhavataḥ khaṇḍanaṃ viparītam /
XXbsa069_u:358: yadi vartikā kṣudrā jyotirapi kṣudram, iti sthāpite /
XXbsa069_u:359: prativādī prāha yadi sādharmyādyathā ghaṭādyanityaṃ śabdo 'pi tathā syāttadā sarvasya sarveṇāviśeṣaprasaṅgaḥ
XXbsa069_u:364: sadharmāṇyapi sarvāṇi vastūni viśeṣṭavastubhyo bhinnānīti cecchabdo 'pi tathā /
XXbsa069_u:372: sarveṣāṃ na mayā sattvādisādharmyaṃ pratiṣidvamapi tu teṣāṃ viśeṣa evāvadhāryate /
XXbsa069_u:374: taccāsmābhiranityatāsādhanāyocyate na tu sādharmyamātramupādīyate na khalvasti sā kāpi yuktiryā naivaṃ vicāryate /
XXbsa069_u:376: naikamapi vidyate tādṛśaṃ yadanyavastuno na sadṛśaṃ na ca viśiṣṭaṃ syāt /
XXbsa069_u:398: yadi siddhā pratijñopādīyate 'siddhastu heturbhavataḥ khaṇḍanasya viparyāso 'dhikataro bhavet /
XXbsa069_u:399: sarveṣāṃ vastūnāṃ pūrvamabhūtvā paścādabhāva iti mayoktam /
XXbsa069_u:402: yadi pūrvaṃ śabdaḥ sanneva na cāsti pratibandhastadā kasmācchrotreṇa nopalabhyate /
XXbsa069_u:404: yadi kañcidviśiṣṭabuddhirabhimatamarthaṃ sādhayituṃ na śaknoti, iṣṭasādhanaṃ ca na yuktisampannaṃ so 'rtho nirasanīyaḥ /
XXbsa069_u:408: atha hetuḥ sādhyaṃ na prāpnoti tadāpyasādhakaḥ /
XXbsa069_u:411: yadi hetuḥ sādhyaṃ prāpnoti tadā sādhyena saṃsargātsādhyaṃ na sādhayati /
XXbsa069_u:424: yadi bhavataḥ khaṇḍanamutpattihetusamāśritaṃ tadā siddhaṃ khaṇḍanam /
XXbsa069_u:427: uktaṃ mayā yaddhetuḥ sādhyaṃ notpādayatyapi tu parapratipādanārthaṃ sādhyaṃ vyanaktyavyāvṛttatvāt
XXbsa069_u:433: yathā rūpasattve 'pi pradīpaprayojanaṃ tadvyañjanārthaṃ na tu tadutpattyartham /
XXbsa069_u:439: yadi tāvaddhetuḥ prāk sādhyañca paścāttadāsati sādhye, hetuḥ kasya sādhakaḥ? /
XXbsa069_u:440: atha paścāt, sādhyañca prāk, tadā siddhe sādhye kiṃ hetunā? /
XXbsa069_u:442: yathā yugapatsadbhāvāṅgoḥ śṛṅge dakṣiṇaṃ vāmaṃ vā parasparotpādake ityayuktam /
XXbsa069_u:447: tadeva hetunā vyajyate yathā dīpaḥ vidyamānānyeva vastūni vyanakti na tvavidyamānāni vastūnyutpādayati
XXbsa069_u:448: bhavān punarutpattihetunā me vyañjakahetuṃ khaṇḍayati tasmādviparītametatkhaṇḍanaṃ, na tu siddham /
XXbsa069_u:449: atha manyase yadyeṣa heturvyañjakaheturbhavati jñānābhāve sa kasya hetuḥ /
XXbsa069_u:450: tasmād vyañjakaheturasiddha iti kṛte khaṇḍane, tadā prāptikriyāsambhave heturnāma nopapadyate kriyāsadbhāve tu heturnāmopapadyate /
XXbsa069_u:452: taduktaṃ bhavati pūrvaṃ heturnāma nopapadyate paścāttu heturnāmopapadyate /
XXbsa069_u:453: yaccābhihitaṃ hetuḥ prāk kriyā tu paścāditi tadadoṣam /
XXbsa069_u:454: athaivaṃ sati, kriyāyā hetuto 'nutpattiriti cedetat khaṇḍanamasiddham /
XXbsa069_u:458: vastuni vinaṣṭe paścāt kriyotpattiriti cet, tadaitatkhaṇḍanaṃ sidhyati na tvevamucyate, pūrvaṃ bhāve 'pi [hetoriti] nāmānupapattiḥ paścāttu nāmopapattiḥ /
XXbsa069_u:464: yadi prayatna[ānantarīyaka]tvācchabdo 'nityastadā yatra prayatno na vidyate tatra nityatāprasaṅgaḥ
XXbsa069_u:465: yathā vidyudvāyvādīnyaprayatna [ānantarīyaka]āṇyanityeṣu cāntarbhūtāni tasmādanityatve sādhye na prayatnamātraṃ samāśrayaṇīyaṃ
XXbsa069_u:467: sādhanañcedyatra yatra prayatno nāsti tatra tatra nityatāyāḥ sambhavaḥ /
XXbsa069_u:478: yathā kasyacitpratijñā syāt sarve taravo divyacetanā iti /
XXbsa069_u:484: śirīṣa eva svapiti na tvapare taravaḥ /
XXbsa069_u:485: sa svapno na sarvāṃstarūn vyāpnoti tasmātsarveṣāṃ tarūṇāṃ divyacetanatvapratiṣṭhāpane svapno 'samarthaḥ /
XXbsa069_u:489: naitaducyate mayā yatprayatnaḥ sarvānityatākhyāpane samartho heturanye tu hetavo 'samarthāḥ
XXbsa069_u:493: asmatsthāpito hetuḥ khyāpanasamarthaḥ, anyo 'pi hetuḥ khyāpanasamarthaḥ /
XXbsa069_u:502: yadyahaṃ bravīmi yadyadanityaṃ tattatsarvaṃ prayatnasamutpannamiti tadā prayatnotpattihetoravyāpitvādasiddhatvamiti bhavatā khaṇḍanaṃ vaktavyam /
XXbsa069_u:512: yatsamutpannaṃ tatprayatena vyaktaṃ yathā mūlakīlakodakaṃ prayatnena vyaktaṃ na tu prayatnena samutpannam /
XXbsa069_u:516: kathaṃ ca śabdo 'vadhāryate? kiṃ ghatavadasamutpannaḥ samutpadyate mūlakīlodakavatsamutpanno vā vyajyate?
XXbsa069_u:524: api tu yataḥ prayatnena samutpannastasmācchabdo 'nitya iti /
XXbsa069_u:545: yadi bhavato ghaṭadhvaṃsasya dhvaṃse sadbhāvastataḥ sadbhāvāddhvaṃsābhāvaḥ syāt /
XXbsa069_u:555: yadi khapuṣpādīnāṃ sadbhāvo bhavatā nānujñāyate, tadā ghaṭadhvaṃsasyāpi tathātvam /
XXbsa069_u:564: yatprayatnenopalabhyate yacca prayatnena kriyate tadubhayaṃ bhinnamiti bhavatā pratiṣṭhāpitam
XXbsa069_u:571: yaccocyate yadabhivyaktaṃ nityamiti tasya kiṃ prayojanam /
XXbsa069_u:576: prayatna iti vacanaṃ śabdasyānityatāheturiti cettadā kiṃ prāpyate? (Tś 23) prayatna ityanukte tadā śabdo nityaḥ /
XXbsa069_u:581: asmābhiḥ sthāpito heturabhivyaktyartho notpattyartho na vā vināśārthaḥ /
XXbsa069_u:585: yadi vināśahetunā mām khaṇḍayati bhavān tadviparītakhaṇḍanaṃ syāt /
XXbsa069_u:586: 10. kāryabhedakhaṇḍanam- kāryyabhedād ghaṭavatacchabda iti na vaktavyam /
XXbsa069_u:588: anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād ghaṭavaditi sthāpite prativādī prāha ghaṭaśabdayoḥ kāryabhedaḥ /
XXbsa069_u:593: api tu sarvāṇi vastūni tulyena nyāyena kṛtakatvād anityānītyevamuktam /
XXbsa069_u:609: yathā śabdatvaṃ (Tś 24) śravaṇagrāhyaṃ nityañca, tathā śabdo 'pi tasmānnityaḥ /
XXbsa069_u:612: yadi nityaṃ hetunā sthāpyate, tato hetukriyatvādanityam /
XXbsa069_u:615: kasmāt? na mayoktaṃ hetunā nityatotpanneti, api tu heturanityatāṃ vyanakti /
XXbsa069_u:640: yadi hetuṃ vinā (Tś 25) ghaṭasya nityatā sthāpitā
XXbsa069_u:668: meghe satyapi tu kadācidṛṣṭirbhavati kadācinna bhavatītyanaikāntikatā /
XXbsa069_u:671: dhūme dṛṣṭe satyagniranumīyate dhūme tvasati agnerabhāvaḥ /
XXbsa069_u:691: tacca cakrasyānaikāntikatā yat pravartanakāle sat, sthitikāle cāsat /
XXbsa069_u:696: asādharmyaṃ yacchabdaḥ śravaṇagrāhyo 'mūrtaśca ghaṭastu cakṣurgrāhyo mūrtaśca /
XXbsa069_u:710: yadi sato nityavaṃ siddhastadā dṛṣṭāntaḥ sada khaṇḍanam /
XXbsa069_u:725: vastu sahetukañcet tadānityamiti jñeyaṃ ghaṭādivaditi sthāpite /
XXbsa069_u:742: yadi sāmānyavanna nityo bhavet, tadā ghaṭadṛṣṭāntenānityo na bhavet /
XXbsa069_u:745: yadi gavādisāmānyaṃ gavādivyatiriktaṃ syāttadā pṛthaktvena grāhyaṃ draṣṭavyañca (Tś 28) sāmānyantu gavādivyatiriktaṃ pṛthaktvena gṛhyate na ca dṛśyate /
XXbsa069_u:759: tatsaṅkhyāparimāṇaṃ smṛtidhāraṇārthaṃ, ekaṃ, daśa, sahasraṃ niyutamityādyucyate /
XXbsa069_u:763: arthavisaṃvādakaṃ viruddhamityucyate, yathā prabhāndhakārau sthitigatī visaṃvādake /
XXbsa069_u:777: yadi kaścidvadedvandhyāputraḥ (Tś 29) kṛṣṇo bandhyāputraḥ śveta iti tadapi siddham bhavet
XXbsa069_u:792: etatritayamaprayatna[ānantarīya] kaṃ bhavatā tvekena prakāreṇa nityamiti manyate /
XXbsa069_u:803: yadi kaścidvadedandhakāre prabhāstīti tadvacanamapi siddhaṃ bhavet /
XXbsa069_u:806: anityateti pṛthagdharmo 'nityena na sambaddhaḥ yo nityo mantavyaḥ /
XXbsa069_u:808: yadyanutpannaṃ vastūtpattiṃ labhata utpannantu vinaśyati tato 'nityamityucyate /
XXbsa069_u:817: yadi tāvattava khaṇḍanaṃ matpratijñāṃ prāpnoti, matpratijñātulyatve
XXbsa069_u:822: yadi hetuḥ pūrvaṃ pratijñā tu paścāt, tadā pratijñābhāve sa kasya hetuḥ /
XXbsa069_u:825: yadi bhavatkhaṇḍanaṃ pūrvamasmatpratijñā tu paścādasmadarthābhāve kiṃ bhavatā khaṇḍyate /
XXbsa069_u:826: yadyasmatpratijñā pūrvaṃ bhavatkhaṇḍanaṃ tu paścāttadāsmatpratijñāyāṃ sthāpitāyāṃ kiṃ bhavatkhaṇḍanena
XXbsa069_u:829: mayā prakaṭitaṃ yadbhavatkhaṇḍanaṃ bhavadarthameva pratiṣedhati na tu bhavatkhaṇḍanamavalambyāsmadartho pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ /
XXbsa069_u:845: dvitīyo mūrdhā rūpagandhādimūrdhākārato na pṛthak mantavyaḥ /
XXbsa069_u:853: yadi punarbhavān vadati yadātmalakṣaṇamaviśeṣyaṃ, sa tu sanniti tadā dvitīyo mūrdhaviśeṣyo 'pi sanneva bhavet /
XXbsa069_u:854: dvitīyo mūrdhā sanniti bhavatā cenna pratipādyate tadātmanyapi tathā pratipattavyam /
XXbsa069_u:859: tadāhamapi nyāyāsamaśrayātsanneva dvitīyo mūrdhā na tvātmeti cedvadeyameṣo 'rthaḥ sidvo bhavet
XXbsa069_u:860: athāsmadartho na siddho bhavadartho 'pi na sidva ityucyate prasaṅgavyaktiḥ /
XXbsa069_u:862: ātmā dvitīya iva mūrdhāviśeṣyaḥ na tvasanniti cettadā vaiṣamyadoṣo bhavanmūrdhyāpatet /
XXbsa069_u:863: yadi kaścidvadedvandhyāputraḥ sālaṅkāro bandhyāputro niralaṅkāra iti tadapi siddhaṃ bhavet
XXbsa069_u:868: nyāyāsamāśrayānniyatameva nāsti dvitīyo mūrdheti siddhaṃ ca tadvacanamiti tadā (Tś 32) mūrkhabālānyāyavacanānyapi sidhyeyuryathākāśo dṛśyaḥ, śītolo
XXbsa069_u:885: kasyacinnigrahasthānāpattirbhavet, na punastena saha vādaḥ kartavyaḥ /
XXbsa069_u:893: / śabda ākāśasādharmyannitya iti cettato yadi vaidharmyaṃ syāt, tadānityaḥ
XXbsa069_u:897: sādharmyaṃ vaidharmyaṃ vā na mayā samālocyate /
XXbsa069_u:905: vaidharmyaṃ tu sarvamanityaṃ nityavyatiriktamiti niścitaṃ vyanakti /
XXbsa069_u:916: asparśatvahetunā nityaḥ śabda iti bhavatā sthāpitam /
XXbsa069_u:923: yadi heturasiddhastadā pratijñāpyasiddheti prasiddhamiti pratyavasthita idamāha
XXbsa069_u:924: / śabdo nityatā ceti na mama pratijñā /
XXbsa069_u:927: yo mayā nirdiṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ sa rūpādiniṣedhārthaḥ /
XXbsa069_u:928: yā ca mayā nirdiṣṭā nityatā, sā nityatāniṣedhārthā /
XXbsa069_u:930: śabdo nityatāyā na vyatiricyate śrotragrāhyādikāttu vyatiricyate /
XXbsa069_u:933: mayā na śabdo na ca nityatā sthāpyate /
XXbsa069_u:934: bhavān punaḥ śabdañca nityatāñca khaṇḍayati (Tś 35) na tu mama pratijñāṃ khaṇḍayati /
XXbsa069_u:943: iti sthāpite 'paraḥ prāha bhavatoktaṃ sarvamanityaṃ tasmānnityaḥ śabda iti
XXbsa069_u:962: iti sthāpite 'paraḥ prāha nityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvāditi bhavatoktam /
XXbsa069_u:967: tathā hi gavādisāmānyaṃ gavāderabhinnaṃ bhinnaṃ vā /
XXbsa069_u:969: bhinnañced, gorvyatiriktaṃ sāmānyaṃ prakāśeta na tu gorvyatiriktaṃ sāmānyaṃ prakāśate tasmāddṛṣṭānto na nityatāsādhakaḥ /
XXbsa069_u:971: (Tś 36) iti dūṣaṇe kṛte prativādī prāha kenaitatsthāpitam /
XXbsa069_u:985: yathā vāyoḥ sparśasya ca sakṛdevābhivaktavāpi vāyuranityaḥ /
XXbsa069_u:993: pūrvamuktaṃ bhavatā śabdo nityo dviranabhivyaktatvādityadhunā tūcyate śabdo vāyuvilakṣaṇaḥ pṛthagindriyagrāhyatvāditi prathamahetutyāgena bhavata hetvantaraṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam /
XXbsa069_u:1006: yadi kaściddharmaṃ vakti pariṣattu prativādī ca jijñāsāvapi trirabhihitaṃ jñātumasamarthau
XXbsa069_u:1007: yathā (kaścidvaded) aṇuramūrtaḥ sukhotpādakaḥ duḥkhotpādako 'prāpto sāpakarṣotkarṣaḥ samito 'sannyāso na vināśaḥ /
XXbsa069_u:1014: daśavidhaṃ phalaṃ trividhaḥ kaṃbala ekavidhaṃ pānabhojanametadapārthakamucyate /
XXbsa069_u:1018: yathā pārimāṇḍalyāśrayasya paramāṇornityatvātpārimāṇḍalyaṃ nityaṃ śabdasyāpi tathātvasambhava iti kṛte 'paraḥ prāha /
XXbsa069_u:1026: yathā gṛhe dagdhe tatparitrāṇāyodakānveṣaṇaṃ tathānavasare 'rtharakṣaṇāya hetusthāpanam
XXbsa069_u:1033: yadvastu kṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ kṛtako 'nityaśceti tṛtīyo 'vayavaḥ /
XXbsa069_u:1048: atha sādhanasamarthastadā kiṃ hetubāhulyena udāharaṇabahulye 'pi tathātvasambhavaḥ /
XXbsa069_u:1055: arthāpattipunaruktaṃ yathā (kaścidvadet) satyaṃ saṃsāro duḥkhaṃ satyaṃ nirvāṇaṃ sukham /
XXbsa069_u:1061: yadi na kiñcit prakaṭayitavyaṃ tadā tadaprayojanam /
XXbsa069_u:1069: yadi parasya pratijñāṃ nyāyavadīkṣate dūṣaṇe cāsamarthastadāpratibhā /
XXbsa069_u:1073: yadi kaścidarthaṃ na vijānāti dūṣaṇe cāsamarthastena saha vādo na kartavya iti /
XXbsa069_u:1075: anyeṣu nigrahasthāneṣu, sadoṣasya vacanasya vividhenopāyenoddharaṇaṃ śakyam /
XXbsa069_u:1080: svapratijñāyā doṣaṃ jñātvā vyājaiḥ parihāraḥ kāryāntarakathanam /
XXbsa069_u:1081: yathāhaṃ svayaṃ rogī, ahaṃ paraṃ roginaṃ
XXbsa069_u:1083: tadā tu yadi nāpakrāmati paradūṣaṇanirākaraṇaṃ na kalpayati /
XXbsa069_u:1089: yadi kaścit pareṇa dūṣaṇe kṛte, svapakṣadoṣamanujānāti, yathā mama doṣa evaṃ bhavato 'pītyabhyupagacchan
XXbsa069_u:1092: yadi kaścinnigrahasthānaṃ prāpnuyāt, tasya nigrahāpattyanudbhāvanaṃ taddūṣaṇecchayā tu (Tś 40) dūṣaṇasthāpanam /
XXbsa069_u:1093: tadarthe ca hīne kiṃ prayojanaṃ dūṣaṇena /
XXbsa069_u:1117: yaḥ saśṛṅga sa gaurityanaikāntikaḥ chāgarurvādīnāṃ saśṛṅgatvāt /
XXbsa069_u:1126: yadi kenacideṣa hetuḥ prayujyate tadā hetvābhāsanigrahasthānāpattiḥ /
